page.title: 11VANDALISM POEM
page.content:
{VANDALISM POEM By Louise Woolard
Broken windows,smashed up panes, Mucky spitting down the drains Aerosol cans sparkling new They spray the paint on what belongs to you.
Making noise so you can't sleep, Drinking beer out in the streets, Discos open 8 till 2, They spray the paint upon the loo.
Great Big Doc's upon their feet, Throwing litter in the street, Wearing jeans so very tight They give you such a tremendous fright
{(Great Big Doc's are large boots) { {HECKMONDWIKE JUNIOR SCHOOL {
